questions.paragraph: When pushing a ball on the ground, it moves a distance and then stops. Mention the reason.
What is the relationship between the mass of the truck and the distance it travels when subjected to a force
popup: The greater the mass of the truck, the less the distance it travels when a constant force is applied.

questions.paragraph: When you sit on a chair without movement, what is the name of the force that pulls you downward?Â
Mention an example of a push force and a pull force.
What happens when a force is applied to a an object at rest?
popup: It moves in the direction of force.
